          <title>
            <string language="en">Spreading of colour in solution</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Verbreiten der Farbe in gelöster Form</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Propagation de couleur en solution</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Espalhar da cor na solução</string>

          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows a set-up to study the formation of coloured solution over a period of time.</string>
          </description>

          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt eine Installation, um die 
Anordnung der farbigen Lösung über eine Zeitdauer von Zeit zu 
studieren.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre que une installation 
étudiait la formation de la solution colorée sur une certaine 
période de temps.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra uma instalação para 
estudar a formação da solução colorida sobre um período de tempo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra una messa a punto per
studiare la formazione della soluzione colorata per un periodo di 
tempo.</string>

          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει μια οργάνωση για να 
μελετήσει το σχηματισμό της χρωματισμένης λύσης για μια χρονική 
περίοδο.</string>
          </description>
